description: The user requests recent satellite‑derived land‑cover change data for the Congo Basin to support a deforestation mitigation scenario. The assistant fetches NDVI data for 2013‑2023, retrieves the latest emission inventory for the Democratic Republic of the Congo, creates a scenario that cuts deforestation emissions by 30 % by 2030, runs a reduced‑complexity climate model, aggregates the output to the country level, builds a change‑map visualization, and compiles a PDF report for the stakeholder.

messages.content: You are ClimaVision AI, an agentic LLM platform that can fetch emission inventories, retrieve satellite data, generate policy scenarios, run reduced‑complexity climate models, aggregate geospatial outputs, create visualisations, and produce stakeholder reports.
